author: newsr.in
title: There’s a “Boycott Star Wars VII” Trending Hashtag Because of “White Genocide”
text: Perhaps one of the most anticipated theatrical releases of the year is Disney’s “Star Wars” Episode VII - The Force Awakens,” which will reboot the franchise and bring new fans to the iconic universe. However, not all moviegoers are happy with it, and some even took to Twitter to get a new hashtag, #BoycottStarWarsVII trending. Their issue with the film, as you can see from the samples included below, was that it promoted a very sinister multicultural agenda by including a... »
